title: Login Status Authenticating....
body: This is all I see when I try to login after the 8.2 patch.... anyone else having the same issues? I've tried everything with my Firewall, Windows Defender, Inbound/Outbound connections, checked the server status... idk what else to do... someone pls send halp. =(((

replies.body: What precisely have you tried with your firewall? Be sure to add exceptions to your firewalls and antivirus, as well as updating your DNS server settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4. Let me know if it's still not working after trying the DNS changes and [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3) again.
I've even reinstalled... and it's still the same shit. What's the issue? =/ I was playing 7-8 hours ago and everything was fine.
